description:
Keep your gear nice and dry with these weatherproof pods. If you are looking to carry more gear on your Spider rack, but want an option to the standard dry bag, these are just the thing. Pods can be rotated, so you can customize your rack to your gear, or your bike (think dropper post).

  • Rigid glass-reinforced nylon backer with frequency welded 600-denier TPU-coated nylon
  • Works with Aeroe Spider rack, rack holds up to 2 pods
  • Internal straps secure cargo
  • Quick-connect bracket mounts to sides or top of Spider rack
  • Stable 3-lugged bayonet mount stays in place on rough terrain
  • TPU strap disengages the multi-position mount
  • Mounting bracket has 15 notches of adjustability, each roughly 15°
  • Fully waterproof construction (not submersible)
  • Load capacity 7kg
name: Aeroe 11L Quick Connect Pod
